text: Drumfusion is an album by drummer and bandleader Chico Hamilton recorded in 1962 and released on the Columbia label.Payne D., Gabor Szabo Iconoclasm, accessed June 30, 2015Charles Lloyd discography, accessed June 30, 2015 ==Reception== The AllMusic review by Scott Yanow states: "The music is melodic at times but not boppish, free in spots but not avant-garde.
